P 14623 - Sentimental Gold - Various Artists [1978] This particular LP has a couple of problems with identification of songs. "Today" is listed as by the New Christy Minstrels, but it is an instrumental version with backing chorus, not the hit. Likewise, "The Green Leaves Of Summer" is not the listed Brothers Four hit, but instead sounds like a Ray Conniff version (as does "Today," in fact).
